name: CoffeeMaker
0:
”Alexa, open Coffee Maker”
”Help me make a cappuccino”
”Give me the recipe for a latte”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coffee maker
des: This skill can help you with making coffee. It speaks out the recipes for making a latte, a mocha, or a cappuccino. Also, it can provide you with information about different sizes. Right now, the skill is uni-directional. In the next version, the skill will be more conversational, with pauses and a more back-and-forth dialog.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
